titleStmt.title: The arte of logick Plainely taught in the English tongue, according to the best approued authors. Very necessary for all students in any profession, how to defend any argument against all subtill sophisters, and cauelling schismatikes, and how to confute their false syllogismes, and captious arguments. By M. Blundevile.
Art of logike.
titleStmt.author: Blundeville, Thomas, fl. 1561.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, and are to be sold by Matthew Lownes,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of: Blundeville, Thomas. The art of logike (STC 3142).
Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library.
